Iam using the newest version of VE downloaded from the eclipse mirrors in belgium this weekend (all features 1.2 or 1.2.1).

The exception can be reproduced as described below:

- open the attached file using the VE
- open context menu of the palette and select 'Layout -> <Foo>' befor(!) it is fully initialized.

So this exception may occure especially on slow or busy machines.

I hope you can reproduce and locate the problem.
